turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I need to order a couple of pizzas from a place called Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need three large gluten-free crust pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 3 large gluten free crust pizzas, 2 cheese, 1 pepperoni, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will be $75, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and will you be dining in, picking up, or having it delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It's going to be a pickup.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok your pizzas will be ready in 35 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?
